AMRN A big barrier to all the big hopes and dreams of the longs for blockbuster sales or a buyout is the fact that you can get very high quality pure EPA fish oil on Amazon for 30mo to 60mo depending on dosage and the number of OTC competitors offering an identical product is growing Prescription Vascepa can cost 300mo Both sides can thrive but there are unknowns about how big Vascepa can grow and this hurts the most optimistic longs that believe it will be as big as lipitor etc The OTC competition will also give pause to any big pharma considering overpaying for it Thoughts

AMRN most who follow this stock closely and the science know that the report released by MRC actually last week is an old argument regarding using mineral oil as a placebo comparison The FDA is aware of this and okay with it because for such oilbased sidebyside studies mineral oil has been used as a placebo for over 50 years Also given the dosage it may have at max 5 variation in the results still v strong resultsnot to mention no one really knows the how the exact mechanism of how Vascepa worksthats being elucidated currently which makes the direct comparison to mineral oil even less important Either way it only makes me that much resolute in this that someone would go out of their way to discredited it by any meansor least it better be all nonsense haha because I have a large stake in it
